property.name: Rules
property.value: Ultimate Evolution: Put on 1 of your Evolution creatures. When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may cast 1 spell from your mana zone without cost. Triple Breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: [Blocker] Blocker If you didn't put a creature with "Blocker" into the battle zone this turn, this creature can't attack. Triple Breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value:
Evolution: Put one 1 of your creatures with "Cyber" in its race or Origins. When you put this creature into the battle zone, put all of your other creatures in the battle zone on the bottom of your deck in any order. Then, reveal cards from the top of your
deck until you reveal 3 non-evolution creatures. Put those creatures into the battle zone, then shuffle your deck including the other revealed cards. Triple Breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: Ultimate Evolution: Put on 1 of your Evolution creatures. When this creature attacks, you may draw up to 3 cards. Double Breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: Ultimate Evolution: Put on 1 of your Evolution creatures. Whenever this creature would be destroyed, you may destroy 1 of your opponent's creatures instead. Triple Breaker

card.name: Bell Hell De Gaul, Footprint of the Reaper

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever 1 of your opponent's creatures are destroyed, shuffle your deck. Then, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is a non-evolution Demon Command, put it into the battle zone. If not, put it into your hand. Double Breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: Ultimate Evolution: Put on 1 of your Evolution creatures. When this creature attacks, destroy up to 2 of your opponent's creatures with 6000 power or less. Triple Breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this creature into the battle zone, search your deck. You may choose 1 card with "Lupia" in its name and put it into the battle zone. Then, shuffle your deck. This creature gets "Power Attacker +1000" for each Fire Bird in your graveyard. Double Breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: Ultimate Evolution: Put on 1 of your Evolution creatures. Quatro Breaker Whenever 1 of your Giants are blocked, that Giant breaks 2 of your opponent's shields.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this creature into the battle zone, put up to 2 of your opponent's non-evolution creatures with a cost of 3 or less into their owner's mana zone. Double Breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolution: Put on 1 of your Angel Commands or Origins Whenever a creature is put into the battle zone you may untap any number of creatures in your battle zone. Those creatures get "Blocker" until the end of that turn. Double Breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: [Blocker] Blocker Evolution: Put on 1 of your creatures with "Blocker" When you put this creature into the battle zone, for each Blocker in your battle zone you may tap 1 of your opponent's creatures. Double Breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: Hand Evolution: Choose 1 water creature in your hand and put this creature into your battle zone on top of the chosen card. This creature can't be blocked. Double Breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value:
Evolution: Put on 1 of your creatures with "Cyber" in its race. Double Breaker When this creature leaves the battle zone, reveal cards from the top of your deck until you reveal a creature. Put that creature into the battle zone and the rest of the cards on
the bottom of your deck in any order. (If you can't put that creature into the battle zone it stays on the top of your deck. Put the other revealed cards on the bottom of your deck in any order.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Grave Evolution: Choose 1 darkness creature in your graveyard and put this card into your battle zone on top of the chosen card. You may summon 1 creature from your graveyard during your turn. (You must still pay the mana cost of this creature.) Double Breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value:
Double Breaker God Link - Ana, Emperor of the Gods or Suva, Emperor of the Gods (Left Side) or Moora, Emperor of the Gods (Top Side) (If the specified god is in the battle zone, you may
link this to it. The linked god gains each god's characteristics (power and abilities) and becomes one creature. When the linked creature leaves the battle zone, select 1 side instead.) When this creature is linked with 3 other Gods, whenever this creature attacks or blocks you may untap it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolution: Put on 1 of your Armored Dragons. Whenever 1 of your opponent's creatures attacks, your opponent chooses 1 of their creatures with 7000 power or less and destroys it. Double Breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value:
When you put this creature into the battle zone, search your deck. For each Dragon in your battle zone you may take a non-evolution cross gear with a cost of 3 or
less, put it into the battle zone, and cross it with that Dragon. Then, shuffle your deck. Double Breaker

card.name: Xenon Da Vinci, Master of Space

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolution: Put on 1 of your Giants, Dreammates, or Origins Soulshift (When you summon this creature, this creature's cost is reduced by the base creature's cost. However, it can't cost less than 1.) Whenever your evolution creatures are destroyed, you may put 1 non-evolution Giant, Dreammate, or Origin into the battle zone from your mana zone. Double Breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: Put up to two Gods into the battle zone from the mana zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: [Blocker] Blocker Evolution Creature: Put on 1 of your creatures with "Blocker". When you put this creature into the battle zone, the power of all the non-evolution creatures in your opponent's battle zone becomes 500 until the end of this turn.

card.name: Phal Ken, Spirit of Binding Light

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this creature into the battle zone, all of your opponent's tapped creatures don't untap at the start of their next turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this creature into the battle zone, put all cross gears in the battle zone into their owner's graveyard.

property.name: Rules
property.value:
When you put this creature into the battle zone, choose 1 creature with the lowest power in your opponent's battle zone. If there are 2 or more creatures tied for the
lowest power you may choose any of them. That creature doesn't untap the start of your opponent's next turn.

property.name: Rules
Rules
property.value: Choose and activate 1 of the following effects: -Choose up to 2 creatures in your battle zone. Those creatures can't be blocked this turn. -At the end of this turn, untap up to 2 creatures in your battle zone. Double Evolution Burst (If you have an evolution creature in the battle zone, you may use both effects.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolution: Put on 1 of your creatures with "Cyber" in its race. Soulshift (When you summon this creature, this creature's cost is reduced by the base creature's cost. However, it can't cost less than 1.) Players can't cast spells that share a civilization with a spell in their graveyard. Double Breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value:
Hand Evolution: Choose 1 water creature in your hand and put this creature into your battle zone on top of the chosen card. When you put this creature into the battle zone, reveal cards from the top of your deck until you reveal 2 cards with the same name. Put those 2 cards into your hand, then
shuffle your deck including the other revealed cards.

property.name: Rules
property.value:
When you put this creature into the battle zone, put 1 of your opponent's non-evolution creatures on the bottom of their deck. Double Breaker When this creature leaves the battle zone, your opponent reveals the bottom card of their deck. If that card is a non-evolution creature they may put it into the battle
zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value:
God Link - Adge, Emperor of the Gods (Right Side) or Mani, Emperor of the Gods or Vishu, Emperor of the Gods (Top Side) (If the specified god is in the battle
zone, you may link this to it. The linked god gains each god's characteristics (power and abilities) and becomes one creature. When the linked creature leaves the battle zone, select 1 side
instead.) When this creature links with another God, you may have your opponent choose 1 of their creatures and return it to their hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value:
Whenever you draw 1 card, you may draw 2 cards instead. If you do, discard 1 card from your hand. When you put this creature into the battle zone, look at your opponent's hand and choose 1 card from it. Your opponent puts the chosen card on the bottom of their deck and
draws 1 card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose and activate 1 of the following effects: -Draw 2 cards. -Choose 1 creature in the battle zone and return it to its owner's hand. Double Evolution Burst (If you have an evolution creature in the battle zone, you may use both effects.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolution: Put on 1 of your Parasite Worms or Ghosts. All of your creatures gain "Slayer" Double Breaker

card.name: Ghoul Ginus, the All-Destroying Fear Lord

property.name: Rules
property.value:
When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may destroy 1 of your other creatures. If you do, your opponent chooses 1 of their shields. This creature breaks
that shield. When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may return 1 of your shields to your hand. However, you can't use the "Shield Trigger" of the returned shield. If you do,
destroy 1 of your opponent's creatures. Double Breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value:
[Blocker] Blocker When you put this creature into the battle zone, show any number of evolution creatures in your hand to your opponent. For each evolution creature shown, choose 1 of your
opponent's creatures. The chosen creature gets -2000 power until the end of the turn. A creature may be chosen 2 or more times in this way.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this creature into the battle zone, discard 1 card from your opponent's hand at random. When this creature leaves the battle zone, your opponent may return 1 card from their graveyard to their hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value:
At the start of your opponent's turn, you may choose 1 of your opponent's creatures. During this turn, the chosen creature must attack your evolution creatures if
possible. All of your evolution creatures gain "Slayer".

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose and activate 1 of the following effects: -Your opponent chooses 1 of their creatures and destroys it. -Your opponent chooses 1 card in their hand and discards it. Double Evolution Burst (If you have an evolution creature in the battle zone, you may use both effects.)

property.name: Rules
property.value:
Deck Evolution: Reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is a creature, put this creature into the battle zone on top of the revealed creature. If the revealed card
isn't a creature return this creature to your hand. This creature gets +3000 power if there is another Armored Dragon in your battle zone. Double Breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value:
Deck Evolution: Reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is a creature, put this creature into the battle zone on top of the revealed creature. If the revealed card
isn't a creature return this creature to your hand. When this creature is destroyed, you may return 1 of the base cards this creature evolved from to the battle zone from your graveyard.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolution: Put on 1 of your Fire Birds. When you put this creature into the battle zone, destroy 1 of your opponent's creatures with "Blocker".

property.name: Rules
property.value: When this creature attacks, choose 1 card in your opponent's mana zone and put it in its owner's graveyard.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this creature into the battle zone, your opponent chooses 1 of their shields. This creature breaks that shield. When this creature leaves the battle zone, your opponent may put 1 card in their hand into their shields face down.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose and activate 1 of the following effects: -Destroy 1 of your opponent's creatures with 6000 power or less. -Destroy up to 3 of your opponent's creatures with 2000 power or less. Double Evolution Burst (If you have an evolution creature in the battle zone, you may use both effects.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this creature into the battle zone, put the top 2 cards of your deck into your mana zone. When this creature leaves the battle zone, put 2 cards from your mana zone on top of your deck in any order.

property.name: Rules
property.value:
When you put this creature into the battle zone, search your deck. you may choose up to 2 evolution creatures from it, show them to your opponent and put them
into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.

property.name: Rules
property.value: If there is a Knight in your opponent's battle zone, this creature gets +6000 power and "Double Breaker. If there is a Knight in your opponent's battle zone, whenever this creature would be removed from the battle zone it remains in the battle zone instead.

card.name: Coon, Golden Lion of the Dawn

property.name: Rules
property.value: This creature gets +1000 power for each evolution card in your mana zone. When this creature has 6000 power or more, it gains "Double Breaker".

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose and activate 1 of the following effects: -Put the top 3 cards of your deck into your mana zone. -Choose 1 of your opponent's non-evolution creatures and put it into their mana zone. Double Evolution Burst (If you have an evolution creature in the battle zone, you may use both effects.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: [Blocker] Blocker Evolution: Put on 1 of your Light Bringers. This creature can't attack players. At the end of your turn, you may untap this creature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: [Blocker] Blocker This creature can't attack players. Whenever your opponent would choose 1 of your creatures, your evolution creatures can't be chosen. (However, they can still be attacked or blocked.) When your opponent chooses this creature, you may put the top card of your deck into your shields face down.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may return 1 spell from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: [Blocker] Blocker This creature can't attack players. When you put this creature into the battle zone, put the top card of your deck into your shields face down. When this creature leaves the battle zone, put 1 of your shields into your graveyard.

property.name: Rules
property.value: You may have your light evolution creatures cost 1 less to summon. They can't cost less than 1.

property.name: Rules
property.value:
Whenever you summon an evolution creature, look at 1 of your shields. Then, you may put the top card of your deck into your shields face down. If you do, put the
shield you looked at on top of your deck.

property.value: Ultimate Evolution: Put on 1 of your Evolution creatures. When this creature attacks, you may return 1 creature in the battle zone to its owner's hand. Double Breaker

battle zone, you may link this to it. The linked god gains each god's characteristics (power and abilities) and becomes one creature. When the linked creature leaves the battle zone, select 1 side

Whenever this creature battles, the opponent's creature that this creature is battling with gets -4000 power until the end of that battle.

property.name: Rules
property.value:
At the start of your turn, you may put 1 evolution creature into the battle zone from your graveyard without cost. (This creature must have a correct base creature to
evolve from.)

property.name: Rules
property.value:
[Blocker] Blocker This creature can't attack. When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may discard 1 card from your hand. If you do, search your deck. You may take a God from it, show it to your opponent, then
put it into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.

property.name: Rules
property.value: You may have your darkness evolution creatures cost 1 less to summon. They can't cost less than 1.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} Choose 1 of your opponent's creatures. That creature gets -2000 power until the end of the turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value:
Ultimate Evolution: Put on 1 of your Evolution creatures When this creature attacks, choose a number. Reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is a creature with the same cost as the chosen number you may put that creature
into the battle zone without cost. (If that card doesn't have the same cost put it back on top of your deck.) Double Breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolution: Put on 1 of your creatures with [Ken, Crimson Lord] in its name. Instead of having this creature attack, you may tap it to use its [Tap] ability: [Tap]: Search your deck. You may choose a card with [Ken Gou, Crimson Lord] in its name and put it on top of this creature. Then, shuffle your deck.

property.name: Rules
property.value:
Deck Evolution: Reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is a creature, put this creature into the battle zone on top of the revealed creature. If the revealed card
isn't a creature return this creature to your hand. This creature can attack untapped creatures until the end of the turn this creature is put into the battle zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: This creature can attack untapped creatures. When this creature is destroyed, choose and activate one of the following effects: -Search your deck. Choose a Dragon from it, show it to your opponent and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your deck. -During this turn, 1 of your creatures in the battle zone gets +2000 power and can attack untapped creatures.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you summon an evolution creature, you may put a creature with a cost of 3 or less into the battle zone from your hand without cost.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolution: Put on 1 of your Dreammate Double Breaker When this creature is destroyed, you may return 1 of the base cards this creature evolved from to the battle zone from your graveyard.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When this creature attacks, choose and activate 1 of the following effects: -Put 1 of your opponent's non-evolution creatures with a cost of 4 or less into their mana zone. -Put 1 card in your opponent's hand into their mana zone at random.

property.name: Rules
property.value: You may have your fire evolution creatures cost 1 less. However, they can't cost less than 1.

property.name: Rules
Rules
property.value: When you put this creature into the battle zone, choose 1 of your opponent's non-evolution creatures with a cost of 4 or less and put it in their mana zone. When this creature leaves the battle zone, your opponent may put a creature with a cost of 4 or less into the battle zone from their mana zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: You may have your nature evolution creatures cost 1 less. However, they can't cost less than 1.

property.name: Rules
property.value:
This turn, 1 of your creatures in the battle zone gets +3000 power and breaks an additional shield. If that creature is an evolution creature you may draw 1
card.

When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may return 1 card from your mana zone to your hand. If you do, put 1 card from your hand into your mana
zone.

property.name: Rules

property.name: Rules
property.value:
Evolution: Put on 1 of your creatures with "Cyber" in its race. When you put this creature into the battle zone, if you have no shields draw 3 cards. If you have only 1 shield, draw 2 cards. If you have exactly 2 shields, draw 1 card. Then,
you may choose a creature in the battle zone and return it to its owner's hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When this creature attacks, you may draw 1 card. If you do, discard 1 card from your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: This creature can attack untapped Knights, Samurai, and Shinobis. If this creature is able to attack, you may destroy 1 of your other creatures. If you do, this creature can attack untapped non-evolution creatures. This creature can't attack players.

property.name: Rules
Rules
property.value: When this creature is destroyed, put 1 of your shields in your graveyard.

property.name: Rules
property.value:
God Link - Mani, Emperor of the Gods or Vishu, Emperor of the Gods (Left Side) or Adge, Emperor of the Gods (Bottom Side) (If the specified god is in the battle
zone, you may link this to it. The linked god gains each god's characteristics (power and abilities) and becomes one creature. When the linked creature leaves the battle zone, select 1 side
instead.) When this creature links with another God, you may discard 1 card from your hand. If you do, return 1 God from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Rules

Whenever you summon an evolution creature, choose 1 card from your opponent's shields and turn it face up. If that card has "Shield Trigger" put it in your
opponent's graveyard.

property.value: When you put this creature into the battle zone, destroy 1 of your opponent's creatures with 2000 power or less.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Instead of having this creature attack, you may tap it to use its [Tap] ability: [Tap]: Search your deck. You may choose a card with [Wan Ken, Crimson Lord] in its name and put it on top of this creature. Then, shuffle your deck.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolution: Put on 1 of your Dreammates or Origins. Double Breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value:
Mana Evolution: Choose a nature creature in your mana zone and put this creature into the battle zone on top of that creature. When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may return all of your Snow Faeries from your mana zone to your hand. If you do, put all of your Snow Faeries in your
graveyard into your mana zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Mana Evolution: Choose a nature creature in your mana zone and put this creature into the battle zone on top of that creature. When this creature would be destroyed, put it into your mana zone instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: If you have an evolution creature in the battle zone, this creature gets +4000 power.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may put 1 card from your hand into your mana zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value:
Cross Gear: Put this card into the battle zone when cast. To cross this card with a creature, pay this card's cost again. When that creature leaves the battle zone,
this card remains in the battle zone. The crossed creature gets +3000 power. You may put an evolution creature of any race on the crossed creature.
